inclusion.criterion: Histologically confirmed diagnosis of WHO grade IV primary malignant glioma (glioblastoma multiforme or gliosarcoma)
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has anaplastic astrocytoma, not glioblastoma multiforme or gliosarcoma.

inclusion.criterion: Evidence of a unilateral, single focus of measurable central nervous system (CNS) neoplasm on contrast-enhanced MRI
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: MRI showed a spinal cord conus mass, but details are not provided.

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have < or = 2 disease progressions
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: Patient has progressive lower extremity weakness and urinary retention, but number of disease progressions is not specified.

inclusion.criterion: An interval of at least 4 weeks from the end of prior radiotherapy or one week from the end of a cycle of chemotherapy
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: Patient received radiation and temozolomide, but timing is not specified.

inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: No information provided about Karnofsky score.

inclusion.criterion: Hemoglobin > or = 9.0 g/dl, absolute neutrophil count (ANC) > or = 1,500 cells/microliters, platelets > or = 125,000 cells/microliters
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: No information provided about blood counts.

inclusion.criterion: Serum creatinine < or = 1.5 mg/dl, serum glutamic-oxaloacetic transaminase (SGOT) and bilirubin < or = 1.5 times upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: No information provided about liver function tests.

inclusion.criterion: Patients on corticosteroids must have been on a stable dose for 1 week prior to entry, if clinically possible
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: Patient is on high-dose steroids, but duration of treatment is not specified.

inclusion.criterion: Signed informed consent approved by the Institutional Review Board
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: No information provided about informed consent.

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy or breast feeding. Women of childbearing potential must have a negative serum pregnancy test within 72 hours prior to treatment administration
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: No information provided about pregnancy status.

exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: Patient has a single focus of measurable CNS neoplasm, but details are not provided.

exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: No information provided about prior treatments.

exclusion.criterion: Prior treatment with CPT-11 or Avastin
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Patient received temozolomide and Avastin, which are similar to CPT-11 and Avastin.

notes: Key unknowns include the number of disease progressions, timing of prior radiotherapy and chemotherapy, Karnofsky score, blood counts, liver function tests, duration of corticosteroid treatment, and informed consent status.
